name: Sphinx-Needs
description: Sphinx-Extension to manage requirements, bugs, test cases and more.

name: Sphinx-Simplepdf
description: Sphinx-Extension to create beautiful PDFs easily based on HTML and CSS.

name: Sphinx-Modeling
description: Sphinx extension to allow the definition of models and constraints for objects defined with Sphinx-Needs.

name: Awesome Sphinx
description: A list of nearly all available Sphinx extensions and themes.

name: Sphinx-Performance
description: Quality focused tool to automatically create Sphinx projects for runtime and memory measurements.

name: WebApp for SW Coordination and Organisation
description: Used by engineers to keep control of development related artifacts.

name: HeyQL Metrics for JIRA
description: Manage metrics and their data inside JIRA issues.

name: JIRA Webhook Server
description: Enables companies to implement complex business processes into JIRA workflows.

name: Groundwork
description: Python Application Framework for rapid prototyping of company internal tools.

name: Groundwork-Web
description: Web-Package for groundwork to enable the development of web applications.

name: Groundwork-Database
description: Adds database managment functions to groundwork applications.

name: Sphinx-TestReports
description: Sphinx-Extension to include test results and more into sphinx.

name: Tox-Envreport
description: Tox plugin to store environment information of the system, which runs the tests.
